price: Kisha Mola wake Mlezi akamteuwa, naye akamkubalia toba yake, naye akamwongoa.
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ وَهَدَىٰ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma ij'tabāhu rabbuhu fatāba ʿalayhi wahadā
